title: Why can't I download the replay?
body: I don't know why but when I tried to download my game is says that and error happen, can you guys help me with that pleas?

replies.body: I have the same problem as well. There was nothing in the replay folder. I can't download any replay, and I tried almost every way I got.

Replays are saved locally to your Documents folder, so no download should be necessary.  You can load it through your match history, but it might not work if it's from an older patch or perhaps some other issue.  I recommend reporting this to the [client boards f](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)or review.  Good luck!
